content: by justyna lorkowska © 2023 lete s knits all rights reserved for personal use only 4 stripe #8 moss attach cc9 round 1 knit around rnds 2&3 *k1 p1* repeat around round 4&5 *p1 k1* repeat around repeat last 4 rnds 3 4 times or desired number break cc9 cuff attach cc1 and knit one round work in 1x1 rib for 2 5 cm/1 bobble round k2 *sl the 2 worked sts to the lh needle and k2tog tbl k1* repeat to end fasten_off and secure end repeat instructions for the second sock finishing weave in all loose ends block the socks as desired enjoy contact and support email support@justynaknits com website - http //www justynaknits com ravelry id - lete ravelry group - lete s knits copyright agreement this pattern is the property of justyna lorkowska it is copyrighted and is for personal and non-profit use only this means you can knit for yourself for a gift or for charity you may not sell socks made from this pattern you may not reproduce this pattern or distribute it from a website this pattern may not be translated reproduced or circulated in another language downloading or printing the pattern constitutes agreement within these terms thank you and enjoy your scrappy socks justyna lorkowska piła poland february 2023 scrappy socks by justyna lorkowska © 2023 lete s knits all rights reserved for personal use only
